synopsis.text: Thinking his life would forever be marked by the tragic car accident that claimed his parents, Teppei Arima's world takes an unexpected turn when he is adopted by his powerful and affluent grandfather, Isshin Arima. As the head of the Arima Financial Combine, Isshin expects Teppei to take over the family business and thrusts him into the world of the elite. To prepare him for his new role, Teppei is enrolled in an exclusive high school reserved for the children of the rich and influential. As if navigating this unfamiliar world isn't challenging enough, Teppei learns of an arranged marriage to the equally wealthy Sylvia van Hossen. Amidst the whirlwind of his newfound fame and fortune, Teppei must find a way to adapt to his lavish lifestyle and the thrilling escapades that come with it.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
